stable.changelog:
New
- OTA updates in app
- New organized settings options
Fixes
- Image disappear when doing move, copy, rename, etc (Android 11)
- Scoped storage behavior
- Hardcoded actionbar
Others
- Added sort button in album list
- Update to apktool 2.5.0
- Cleaning and optimizations
- Update translations
